text: We’re gearing up for longer, sunnier days, and we want a backyard that entices us to step outside and spend time together. Our budget is slim right now, and I know we’re not alone. Therefore, I thought it would be fun to see what kind of an impact $500 could make on a humdrum patio. Lucky for me, IKEA’s Spring Sale is in full swing and boasts some amazing picks for 20% to 50% off. (Cha-ching!) Whether you’re in the market for patio furniture, outdoor accessories, or some fun decor, the sale makes it possible to bring your backyard from basic to beautiful. Think about it. Most outdoor patio furniture sets can run well over $500 to $1,000 or more easily, so you can forget about any extras or personal touches. However, with IKEA slashing prices, a successful springtime shopping spree is well within reach. I scoped out the sales and curated the cutest ideas for a relaxing, comfy backyard oasis. Check out these stand-out pieces to see which ones get the green light for your outdoor space. You get seating for four, complete with a comfy KUDDARNA bench pad and chair cushions for under $300. Was: $404Now: $270 If you need to stretch your budget a bit further, there’s the set with four folding chairs instead and no cushions. Usually $319, on sale for $209. Plus, the bright light hurts my eyes, so I’m always looking for a nice, shady spot. This outdoor HÖGÖN umbrella delivers a wide swath of cover in a crisp, clean white. (The umbrella also comes in fun colors, but you’ll pay $20 more.) Don’t forget to pick up an umbrella base if you don’t already have one. We’re gearing up for longer, sunnier days, and we want a backyard that entices us to step outside and spend time together. Our budget is slim right now, and I know we’re not alone. Therefore, I thought it would be fun to see what kind of an impact $500 could make on a humdrum patio. Lucky for me, IKEA’s Spring Sale is in full swing and boasts some amazing picks for 20% to 50% off. (Cha-ching!)

Whether you’re in the market for patio furniture, outdoor accessories, or some fun decor, the sale makes it possible to bring your backyard from basic to beautiful. Think about it. Most outdoor patio furniture sets can run well over $500 to $1,000 or more easily, so you can forget about any extras or personal touches.

However, with IKEA slashing prices, a successful springtime shopping spree is well within reach. I scoped out the sales and curated the cutest ideas for a relaxing, comfy backyard oasis. Check out these stand-out pieces to see which ones get the green light for your outdoor space.

The Best Picks From The IKEA Spring Sale

The Foundation for a Brilliant Backyard Entertaining Space: The NÄMMARÖ Dining Set

The biggest splurge of my modest backyard budget would go to this NÄMMARÖ dining set with matching chairs and bench made from solid acacia wood. You get seating for four, complete with a comfy KUDDARNA bench pad and chair cushions for under $300.

Was: $404
Now: $270

If you need to stretch your budget a bit further, there’s the set with four folding chairs instead and no cushions. Usually $319, on sale for $209.

Made in the Shade With the HÖGÖN Umbrella

I love enjoying the sunshine, but that doesn’t mean I want to bake in it. Plus, the bright light hurts my eyes, so I’m always looking for a nice, shady spot.

This outdoor HÖGÖN umbrella delivers a wide swath of cover in a crisp, clean white. (The umbrella also comes in fun colors, but you’ll pay $20 more.) Don’t forget to pick up an umbrella base if you don’t already have one.

Was: $59.99
Now: $39.99

Bring the Bling With SOLVINDEN String Lights

Add a touch of whimsy and a warm glow to your outdoor entertaining as your daytime fun moves into evening festivities. One strand of these battery-operated string lights offers nearly 12 feet of paper-lantern style lights.

Was: $11.99
Now: $6.99

Add a Cute Seating Area With These Charming Picks

When crafting a functional outdoor space, I find it best to create different zones. A dining area is a popular one, but it’s also nice to have a cozy spot for conversation or sipping cocktails. Here are the cute and colorful IKEA spring sale items I’d snag for my relaxation station.

TUMHOLMEN Rocking Chair

Pick up two of these durable and festive TUMHOLMEN multi-colored rockers. They feature a removable, machine-washable cover, making it easy to maintain their bright, clean look.

Was: $89.99/each
Now: $59.99/each

SUNDSÖ Folding Table

Add a place to keep your drink, set down a snack, or keep your favorite novel close at hand when you’re enjoying your outdoor seating area. The vibrant SUNDSÖ folding table comes in a bunch of fun colors and is easy to set up and take down as you need it. 

Was: $59
Now: $41

STRANDÖN Folding Stool

This cute little STRANDÖN folding stool gives you a quick way to add extra seating in a pinch. Now, when more friends want to join the conversation, simply pop open the stool and you’re good to go.

Was: $9.99
Now: $6.99

Show Off Your Favorite Flowers in the CHIAFRÖN Plant Pot

Place the CHIAFRÖN 6-inch plant pot on the table to add a fresh centerpiece to your seating area. It’s made from durable, frost-resistant stoneware, so it’s ready to add beauty to your patio for years to come.

Was: $11.99
Now: $6.99

Add a Little Extra Light at Night With SOLVINDEN LEDs

Set a few of these decorative SOLVINDEN LED lights throughout your backyard oasis to create an inviting glow at night. Since they’re battery-operated, you don’t have to worry about any unsightly cords or tangled wires cramping your style.

Was: $3.99
Now: $1.99

IKEA Spring Steals We Can’t Skip

Okay, so I stuck to my $500 budget with the above list of amazing IKEA deals, earning me a swanky seating area and comfy dining spot. But I’d be remiss not to mention these other incredible deals, just in case you’re looking for a little something extra or prefer a different style for your outdoor happy place.

Add Flexible Seating With TÄRNÖ Folding Chairs

Need to add extra seating on the fly? The TÄRNÖ folding chairs look stylish and sleek, but they’re easy to set up in a snap and stow away when not in use.

Was: $25.00
Now: $15.00

The ASKHOLMEN Table Is Perfect for a Small Space

If you’re working with a small patio, this folding wall table is a good fit. The ASKHOLMEN half-circle table goes against the wall and provides ample space to enjoy a meal with your favorite person.

Was: $29
Now: $19

Decorative SOLVINDEN Floor Lamp

Is it a lamp? Is it art? I think it’s both, especially when you see the cool shadows and shapes the light casts. The SOLVINDEN floor lamp adds lighting and a cool backdrop to your evening party scene.

Was: $24.99
Now: $14.99

RESÖ Picnic Table for Kids

Let the kids join the action with their very own perfectly pint-sized picnic table. The RESÖ children’s table is ideal for kids 3 to 7 years old.

Was: $69.99
Now: $44.99

Clean Up Clutter With the VRENEN Storage Box

Nothing ruins the mood of an outdoor party like a cluttered mess. Stow outdoor supplies, kids’ toys, and other items in this durable VRENEN storage box to keep your backyard tidy.

Was: $349
Now: $239

BONDHOLMEN Bench With Backrest

I can picture this sleek, eucalyptus BONDHOLMEN bench in the center of a lush, secret garden, creating a quiet retreat. Or it’s equally at home in the middle of the action as an extra place to kick back and relax.

Was: $249
Now: $169

NÄMMARÖ Reclining Chair

Take a cat nap in the afternoon sunshine or relax with a good book in the comfy reclining NÄMMARÖ chair. It’s made of durable acacia wood and pre-treated to hold up well against sun and rain.

Was: $125
Now: $80

The Sophisticated SEGERÖN Armchair

Add a splash of modern style to your outdoor galas with the hip SEGERÖN armchair in gray or dark green. Pair it with the FRÖSÖN cushion cover (was: $15, now: $10) and DUVHOLMEN chair pad (was: $15, now: $10).

Was: $120
Now: $80

Dreamy DUVSKÄR Bistro Set

I love the upscale, slick look of the DUVSKÄR bistro set. I imagine enjoying a delicious breakfast on my patio or dining al fresco with my hubby for an at-home date night.

Was: $369
Now: $249

Honestly, there are so many great deals on outdoor items in the IKEA Spring Sale, you don’t want to miss it. There are tons of ways to build a backyard barbecue zone, ramp up patio storage, or even spend the day at the beach. And it’s all for affordable prices that you can’t pass up.

Pair these steals with the now online as-is section, and you can find even more jaw-dropping bargains. Input your nearest IKEA location to see what’s available in a store near you, and reserve it online so you can snatch it up during your next visit.

IKEA’s Spring Sale Slashes Prices Without Sacrificing Style

If you’re ready to design the outdoor space you’ve been dreaming of, then it’s time to get started. These lower prices definitely make it possible to turn your dream into a reality.

Looking for other great ways to boost your home’s style? Check out more of IKEA’s latest products to add springtime flair to your kitchen or give your bedroom a refreshing makeover. The only thing to figure out now is where to start.
